snippet: GigaOM, a technology media company, has acquired ContentNext Media, the parent company of paidContent, from Guardian News & Media Limited, for an undisclosed sum, amid an industry consolidation, reports Evelyn M. Rusli on Dealbook.
abstract: GigaOM, a technology media company, has acquired ContentNext Media, the parent company of paidContent, from Guardian News & Media Limited, for an undisclosed sum, amid an industry consolidation, reports Evelyn M. Rusli on Dealbook.
lead_paragraph: The technology media company has acquired ContentNext Media, the parent company of paidContent, from Guardian News & Media Limited, for an undisclosed sum, amid an industry consolidation, reports Evelyn M. Rusli on Dealbook. Read more »
